thread.title: What’s in Georgia May Jagger’s suitcase?
thread.title_full: What’s in Georgia May Jagger’s suitcase?

title: What’s in Georgia May Jagger’s suitcase?
text:
What’s in Georgia May Jagger’s suitcase? Monday August 17, 2015 Print Article 
Georgia May Jagger is the face of jeweller Thomas Sabo’s new campaign. — Picture by Thomas Sabo via AFP-Relaxnews LONDON, Aug 17 — With summer vacations in full swing, we interviewed the British-American model, the face of jeweller Thomas Sabo’s new campaign, on the staples of her summer wardrobe to ensure a 100 per cent fashion vacation. The internationally renowned model, who is the daughter of Mick Jagger and Jerry Hall, tells us that a suitcase without a bikini is not an option when she’s vacationing at the beach. 
What three things must you have with you on vacation? 
A high SPF sunscreen, my camera and a good book. 
What item from your wardrobe do you bring with you no matter where you vacation? 
For summer: bikinis. I buy a new one every time I go on a beach vacation. 
Which staple accessory follows you everywhere you go? 
My engraved Love Bridge bracelets. For summer, I particularly like disc bracelets in blue and turquoise that you can have personalised with engraved dates or initials — very romantic. 
Do you have a beauty tip to look your best on vacation? 
Wear as little makeup as possible. I like the minimalist style when I’m on vacation. But I do like to wear a little gold eye shadow at night. 
Do you have an unusual story from a past vacation? 
I just went to Cambodia and was really impressed by Siem Reap and the temple of Angkor Wat/UNESCO World Heritage. This was really an amazing vacation. 
Who do you dream of going on vacation with? 
(Smiling broadly) My boyfriend. — AFP-Relaxnews More Stories for You:
